lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This kind of opposite of what we normally do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, this is the original Japanese before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now what I'd like to do is kick it over to my friends over here: Travis, Marisha, and Liam.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You completely undercut your whole point.

lines.text: That's how you dub! Anyway, thanks D&D Beyond, and have a pleasant weekend at the D&D live event.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: You can never trust a goblin.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: Yeah, it could be real bad.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: We have really important-- should I be the one talking? We have some really important information that the Bright Queen will want to hear about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please come within the antechamber." All the guards flank around, not aggressively, but they escort you in, an armed escort, back through the echoing halls of the Lucid Bastion.

lines.text: But you wait and you wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is she in the same clothes or does she have different armor on?

lines.text: "That looked a little more than I can handle."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you explain to me what was just going on? Like what was this meeting, do you know, or is this like a community room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This happens every now and then." Maruo's like, "Some folks want a private place to meet, "so they drop me some coin "and I give them the upstairs."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you seen these people before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Only once before, a few months back."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did they have a human with them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's either that or I go along.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just scarfed my cat on Beauregard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're also beat to heck right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to come with me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the way out, I'm going to burn my, should I burn my spells? Is it time to burn spells?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does anyone want to check upstairs?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could send them a message and tell them to turn around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen the figure so you know them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a few minutes to run a Prayer of Healing on a bunch of people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm just here to keep the boss safe."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think you need to tell us everything you have seen or heard these people discuss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They come in here, drop coin "and then talk upstairs."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 17 points of healing to everyone who needs it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So you're a bit of protection here for your boss?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Surprises them from the corner, you know what I mean?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the drow that's striding away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to send him a message?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just keep cool and just be cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me check something real fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick up there next week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (Cockney accent) Hey, Orphan Maker, what happened there, Orphan Maker?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That could've gone sideways quite a few ways.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the nature of the game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To be fair, you were dodging some crazy shit for awhile there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, but if I had just shut up, we would've-- I don't know, we would've been okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a series of things that went wrong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sometimes you teleport inside a dragon or press the release acid button.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I panicked; I thought someone important was getting away!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You remember how much easier this was when we had magical earrings that let us talk to each other?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need to get those earrings.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's so campaign one though, isn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Clusterfuck is so much more fun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We upped the difficulty without them, I like it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I kind of like the clusterfuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't forget, guys, we love you very much and is it Thursday yet? Good night.
